        /* Hamburger menu 
.hamburger-menu {
  color: #000;
  font-size: 2rem;
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .hammenu {
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
  body main header .nav .hammenu {
    display: none;
  }
}

/* Mobile 
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  body main header .nav .hammenu {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    align-items: center;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin-left: 80%;
    margin-top: -10rem;
    width: 2.5rem;
    height: 1.75rem;
    border: none;
    padding-right: 29.25rem;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  }

  .nav ul.header-links {
    display: none;
  }
}

nav ul.header-links {
  list-style: none;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 8%;
  font-size: 2vw;
  padding: 8%;
  margin-top: -15rem;
}

nav ul.header-links li.header-link {
  cursor: pointer;
  height: 20px;
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 15px;
  line-height: 20px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  text-align: center;
  color: #344563;
  flex: none;
  order: 0;
  flex-grow: 0;
}

nav ul.header-links li.header-link:hover {
  color: #36b37e;
}
*/
